This privacy policy sets out how Democracy Technology Ltd (Mi-Voice) uses and protects any information that you give Mi-Voice when you use www.mi-vote.com.
This privacy policy sets out how Democracy Technology Ltd (Mi-Voice) uses and protects any information that you give Mi-Voice when you use www.mi-vote.com.
Please note that all information is anonymised and no personal data is shared with Google.

collector: organisation run election you participate in use platform
text: Mi-Voice's customers (the organisations running the election, referendum or survey you are participating in using our platform) may collect personal information through our voting website (www.mi-vote.com).
The personal information we collect may include (but not limited to) your name, address, age, email and address.
We will hold your personal information on our systems for as long as is necessary for the relevant activity, or as long as is set out in any relevant contract between Mi-Voice and our clients.
